/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is flanked by buildings and trees, creating a canopy of greenery over the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with a few clouds, providing a serene backdrop to the busy street below.
